snippet.title: The Adventures Of Batman & Robin Activity Center for the PC
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game description:

Harley Quinn managed to change a truth serum with a deadly laughing venom which her boyfriend, the Joker, invented. She used that on the researcher Ms. Jones and several Arkham Asylum prison guards, so she could free her boyfriend, aswell as several other loony criminals.

"The Adventures Of Batman & Robin Activity Center"  is a logic game, containing various minigames, aswell as a drawing table, where the player can paint in various pictures.


What I think:

Fun minigames, but there are 3 problems:

In the Jewelry game, it is sometimes hard to match the same jewelry, as they look EXACTLY the same.

In the sewer game, you have to use the mouse to control Batman...

In the Memory game, the comments of the Joker are annoying...REALLY annoying!
